p: A 39‐nt fragment was amplified by PCR using the primers FJJ2009‐26, FJJ2009‐27, and FJJ2009‐32, corresponding to sequences from the NSP gene of the ToLCNDV‐severe isolate (Hussain et al., 2005). The amplicon was fused with the ToLCNDV‐OM DNA‐B fragment digested with NcoI and NheI, and the resultant fragment was cloned into NcoI and NheI‐digested pGANP to create pOM2B:: NSP ins39.
